extension.name: Edit Plus
extension.description: Code editing with line numbers and syntax highlighting.

releases.release: - CDATA tags are now displayed the right way.
- A significant rewrite which abandons the use of a content-editable div. Input now goes to a hidden text area. - It is now possible to paste text from outside the editor into the editor.
- Copy/cut/paste handler rewritten for the sake of Macintosh compatability. - Text drag/drop temporarily disabled.
- Opera problems fixed. - Colour scheme improved.
